comment: I took his class twice.  All you have to do to get an A in his class is read the cases he puts on vista for you.  Go to class and participate in his discussion.  Other than that you have two write two papers for the Midterm and Final and I wouldn't call them papers but more like short essays which probably take an hour if you have half a brain.

Wermert is an awesome professor.  He knows it all about business.  Attendance is not mandatory but if you don't go you wont make a good grade in the class.  He doesn't use the book.  He puts a case up every week.  Read it and go to class and talk about it.  Midterm and Final are so easy if you go to class everyday.
